page.title: 02Cracknore Hard.
page.content: The area we surveyed was mostly for industrial use and some{waste land.} There also was a bit of grassland that wasnt looked after or utilised.It doesnt,look as if it could have been used for grazing,cattle either.There were no shops,hotels,hospitals,clubs whatsoever,only a plumbing shop and a machine parts shop which was in the {ship repair}yard in the industrial area.There were quite a few depots, storage houses and warehouses,used for storing parts for use in the ship repair yard. As we entered into the industrial area we passed an army railway line used for different goods passing from one site to the other. There was also the MacMullan Barracks where there was a army guard keeping watch,making sure nobody entered unless permission was given.
